com.nutiteq.components
Class TextureInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.components.TextureInfo

public class TextureInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for drawing bitmaps as OpenGL textures.

Constructor Detail

TextureInfo

public TextureInfo(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                   float[] texCoords,
                   float width,
                   float height)
Default constructor.

Parameters:
bitmap - bitmap to embed. Bitmap dimensions must be power of 2!
texCoords - texture coordinates for bitmap. Should contain 4 pairs of uv coordinates.
width - bitmap screen width.
height - bitmap screen height.

TextureInfo

public TextureInfo(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                   float[] texCoords,
                   float width,
                   float height,
                   int wrapS,
                   int wrapT)
Specialized constructor for the case when wrapping modes need to be explicitly set.

Parameters:
bitmap - bitmap to embed. Bitmap dimensions must be power of 2!
texCoords - texture coordinates for bitmap. Should contain 4 pairs of uv coordinates.
width - bitmap screen width.
height - bitmap screen height.
wrapS - wrap mode for S or X texture coordinate. Either REPEAT or CLAMP.
wrapT - wrap mode for T or Y texture coordinate. Either REPEAT or CLAMP.
